description.value:
Just as your talented skill spreads tales of your virtue, your virtues feed fuel to the fire of your divinity and increase your skill in turn. It's a virtuous cycle, really. Choose one virtue for which you have at least 8 points. Increase your proficiency rank in one of the virtue's associated skills from expert to master and in another of the associated skills from trained to expert. You gain a skill feat associated with one of the skills you chose; you must meet all its prerequisites.

Special You can gain the Virtue's Virtuoso boon up to five times if your virtues are high enough. Each time you do so, you must choose a different virtue.

value.value: trained in one of that virtue's skills and expert in another
